I'll craft an offer for Bob that aims to maximize my earnings while still being acceptable to him.

{"message": "Hello Bob, I'm pleased to offer you this product which I understand would be valuable for your needs. After considering the market value and the product's quality, I'm offering it to you for $11,500. This price represents good value for a product of this caliber, and I believe it will provide excellent utility for you. I look forward to your response.", "product_price": 11500}
